message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, but $90 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Would that work for you?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100?
